definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ho 6:3 place or act of going forth, issue, export, souce, spring;—abs. ´[[מ]] Job 28:1, Ps 75:7; cstr. ´[[מ]] Nu 30:13 + 9 t.; [[מׂחָא]] Job 38:27, Da 9:25; sf. [[מוֹחָאְֲ]] 2Sa 3:25; [[מׂחָאוֹ]] Ho 6:3; [[מוֹחָאוֹ]] Ps 19:7; pl. cstr. [[מוֹחָאֵי]] Is 41:18 + 5 t.; sf. [[מוֹחָאָיו]] Ez Eze 43:11; [[מוֹחָאֵיהֶם]] Nu 33:2, Nu 33:2; [[מוֹחָאֵיהֶן]] Ez Eze 42:11; —

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: the act, of ´[[י]] Ho 6:3; of the sun = rising Ps 19:7 (v. [[יחא]]

definitions.title: 1 f
definitions.body: ); of man 2Sa 3:25 (opp. [[מָבוֹא]] Kt); [[דָּבָר]] ´[[מ]] Da 9:25 going forth of a command.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: concrete, [[מוֹחָאֵי גּוֹלָה]] Ez Eze 12:4 goings forth of  exile, i.e. those going forth into exile (in sim.).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: way out, exit: concrete, of chambers in temple Ez Eze 42:11, Eze 43:11 (opp. [[מוֹבָיׇאו]]); [[מוֹחָאֵי הַמִּקְדָּשׁ]] Ez Eze 44:5 (opp. [[מְבוֹא הַבַּיִת]]).

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: utteranc of mouth or lips (esp. of solemn or formal speech), ´[[מוֹחָא פִי־י]] De 8:3; ´[[שְׂפָתַי מ]] Je 17:16, Ps 89:35; so De 23:24, Nu 30:13 (P).

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: source or spring of water 2Ki 2:21, Is 58:11 (in sim.) Ps 107:33 (‖[[נְהָרוֹת]]), v:Ps 107:35 (‖[[אֲגַמ־מים]]) = Is 41:18 (‖ id.); [[מוֹחָא מֵימֵי גִיחוֹן הָעֶלְיוֹן]] 2Ch 32:30.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: place of departure of Israel on march Nu Nu 33:2, Nu 33:2 (P).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: [[מוֹחָא]] = east (place of sun's going forth) Ps 75:7 (opp. [[מַעֲרָב]]); zeugmatically, Ps 65:9 [[מוֹחָאֵי בּׂקֶר וׇעֶרֶב]] i.e. the east and the west (cf. the two Orients, Qor 43:37).

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: place whence silver comes = mine Job 28:1; [[וּלְהַחְמִיחַ]] [[מׂחָא רֶשֶׁא]] Job 38:27 and to cause the growing-place (others, the growth) of young grass to sprout.
